SELECT d.real_name, (a.apply_pay_back_amt) AS apply_pay_back_amt, IfNULL((a.apply_pay_back_amt / d.pay_total_amt), 0.00) AS apply_pay_amt_rate, IfNULL(a.apply_pay_count,0) as apply_pay_count FROM ( SELECT u.user_name, u.real_name, SUM(overdue_amount) AS pay_total_amt, count(info.id) AS total_count FROM case_info info LEFT JOIN user u ON info.current_collector = u.id LEFT JOIN department d ON u.dept_id = d.id WHERE u. STATUS = 0 AND d.`code` LIKE concat(#{deptCode},'%') AND u.company_code = #{companyCode} AND recover_remark = 0 GROUP BY u.user_name,u.real_name ) AS d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apply_user_name,IFNULL(SUM(apply_pay_amt), 0.00) AS apply_pay_back_amt, count(*) AS apply_pay_count FROM case_pay_apply AS app WHERE (approve_result = 62 OR approve_status = 58)
AND YEAR(app.approve_pay_datetime) = YEAR(NOW())
AND MONTH(app.approve_pay_datetime) = MONTH(NOW())
AND WEEK(app.approve_pay_datetime) = WEEK(NOW())
GROUP BY app.apply_user_name) AS a ON a.apply_user_name = d.user_name ORDER BY apply_pay_back_amt DESC

SELECT d.real_name, IFNULL(b.call_count,0) as call_count, IFNULL(c.follow_count,0) as follow_count, IFNULL(a.total_followed_count,0) as total_followed_count FROM (SELECT user_name,real_name FROM `user` where dept_id in (SELECT id FROM department where code like concat(#{deptCode},'%'))) as d LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as total_followed_count, operator FROM (SELECT b.case_id, b.operator FROM (SELECT case_id,operator FROM case_followup_record WHERE operator_dept_name in (SELECT name FROM department where code like concat(#{deptCode},'%')) AND company_code = #{companyCode}
AND YEAR(operator_time) = YEAR(NOW())
AND MONTH(operator_time) = MONTH(NOW())
AND WEEK(operator_time) = WEEK(NOW())
GROUP BY case_id,operator) as b LEFT JOIN case_info aa on aa.id = b.case_id) as caseInfo GROUP BY operator)as a ON a.operator=d.user_name LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as call_count, operator FROM case_followup_record WHERE collection_way = 0 AND operator_dept_name in (SELECT name FROM department where code like concat(#{deptCode},'%')) AND company_code = #{companyCode}
AND YEAR(operator_time) = YEAR(NOW())

AND WEEK(operator_time) = WEEK(NOW())
GROUP BY operator) as b ON a.operator=b.operator LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) as follow_count,operator FROM case_followup_record WHERE collection_way=1 AND operator_dept_name in (SELECT name FROM department where code like concat(#{deptCode},'%')) AND company_code = #{companyCode}
